sparql: DEFINE get:refresh "0" DEFINE get:soft "replace" PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX bsbm: <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/bizer/bsbm/v01/vocabulary/> PREFIX dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/>  SELECT * WHERE { ?ft rdf:type bsbm:ProductFeature . ?ft rdfs:label ?ftlbl . ?ft rdfs:comment ?ftct . ?prdctft dc:date ?fdate . }
